text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump U @realDonaldTrump are a total worthless piece of shit! Absolute worst fucking president EVER! A puppet to Russia, a fiddle to North Korea & calling covid-19 a hoax & joking about drinking bleach & awarding a medal of freedom to some who kisses ur ass! U are a fucking disgrace!
